author: Jimmy Galvan Sports Editor
title: Falcons need win to keep playoff hopes alive
text: Falcons need win to keep playoff hopes alive   Tompkins will be looking to keep its football playoff hope alive Thursday when the Falcons take on Mayde Creek at Rhodes Stadium at 6:30 p.m. Tompkins enters the contest with a 2-4 overall record, 1-2 in District 19-6A play while Mayde Creek is winless on the season. kA 4=2DDlQA`QmkDA2? 4=2DDlQD`Qm“(6 H2?E E@ E2<6 E9:D D62D@? @?6 H66< 2E 2 E:>6[” D2:5 %@>A<:?D w625 u@@E32== r@249 %@?J %256>J] “(6 D6E =:EE=6 8@2=D 7@C FD 2E 2 E:>6 2?5 E2<6 E96> @?
